job.title: People Data and Process Analyst - Excellence
job.description: ltstronggtJob TitleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtPeople Data and Process Analyst  ExcellenceltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtJob Description SummaryltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThe People Data and Process Analyst  Excellence will collect compile and analyze HR data and metrics and apply this data to make recommendations for all HR data related activities This role is responsible for regular data audits ensuring the integrity and accuracy of the data related to HR records transactions and processes This role is also responsible for Tier 2 issue resolution for all global HR platformsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtJob DescriptionltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtPerforms Data AuditsltligtltligtTroubleshooting of process data reporting and transactional issues within the People TeamltligtltligtResolves tickets including organizational creation process rescinds data validation and reporting requests within specified Service Level Agreement ltligtltligtSupports tactical light configuration within global platforms including table maintenance and calculated fieldsltligtltligtAnalyzes trends and makes recommendations to support data governance and integrityltligtltligtSupports MampampA activities by preparing and loading where applicable EIB and other mass data loads ltligtltligtSupports testing activities and provides opinions associated to data impacts for technical changes and releasesltligtltligtAligns data knowledge wit HR Centers of excellence to ensure data quality and translates data into consumable business languageltligtltligtProvides training and support to People teams as needed to ensure understanding of processes transactions reports and data outcomes ltligtltligtPerforms other related duties as required or requestedltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtQualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt3 years of relative experienceltligtltligtBachelors degree is preferred or equivalent experienceltligtltligtExperience in Workday JD Edwards People Experience Tool is preferredltligtltligtExcellent verbal and written communication skillsltligtltligtStrong analytical and problemsolving skillsltligtltligtAn understanding of local state and federal laws involving employment HR and HR policiesltligtltligtProficient with Microsoft Office Suite or related softwareltligtltligtProficient with or the ability to quickly learn the organizations HRIS payroll and similar employee softwareltligtltulgtCushman ampamp Wakefield provides equal employment opportunity Discrimination of any type will not be tolerated Cushman ampamp Wakefield is an Equal Opportunity  Affirmative Action employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin sexual orientation gender identity disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by state federal or local law
